title: Teg resymmeu offeiriad pabaidd wedi ei hatteb gan Brotestant o Eglwys Loegr. A gyfiethwyd [translated] gan W.J.
author: Comber, Thomas, 1645-1699.
publisher: dros R. Clavell dan Lun y Paun ym Mynwent Dant Pawl.
notes: Translation of "The plausible arguments of a Romish priest answered by an English Protestant."
Imperfect: stained, cropped, defaced, and with print show-through, with loss of text; p. 51-54 lacking, and replaced with photocopies. Best copy available for photographing.
Reproduction of original in: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru/National Library of Wales, Aberystwyth, Wales.
